description: Implementation of the TokenCache class, providing methods to store, retrieve, and manage cached token entries with expiry considerations.

classes.name: TokenCache
classes.description: A cache mechanism for storing tokens with expiry handling, supporting thread-safe operations.

methods.name: void Put(const std::string & key,const TokenEntry & entry)
methods.description: Stores a TokenEntry associated with a key into the cache, with thread safety.

methods.name: bool Get(const std::string & key,std::string & outJson) const
methods.description: Retrieves a token JSON string from the cache if it exists and is not expired or expiring soon.

methods.name: void Clear()
methods.description: Clears all entries from the cache.

methods.name: bool IsExpiringSoon(uint64_t nowEpochSec,uint64_t expiryEpochSec) const
methods.description: Determines if a token is nearing expiry based on current time and refresh window.

ctags.name: Get
ctags.pattern: /^    bool TokenCache::Get(const std::string& key, std::string& outJson) const {$/

ctags.name: IsExpiringSoon
ctags.pattern: /^    bool TokenCache::IsExpiringSoon(uint64_t nowEpochSec, uint64_t expiryEpochSec) const {$/

ctags.name: Put
ctags.pattern: /^    void TokenCache::Put(const std::string& key, const TokenEntry& entry) {$/
